Plot: Hannibal Lecter. The ultimate villain of modern fiction. Read the five-million-copy bestseller that scared the world silent. The Silence of the Lambs. A young FBI trainee. An evil genius locked away for unspeakable crimes. A plunge into the darkest chambers of a psychopath's mind--in the deadly search for a serial killer. - back cover
Characters: Jack Crawford, Hannibal Lecter, Clarice Starling
Setting: Washington, D.C. (United States), Memphis, Tennessee (United States)
